item.title: ::snowon and ::snowoff
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Send the walkable interface packet… It’s used for the wildy sign.

Read full topic

item.title: ::snowon and ::snowoff
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

The snow interface ID:
Snow Interface Id = 11877

I know how to make an interface appear… but I was preparing my Christmas Event so early in the year… And what kind of Christmas is it without snow?
Id like you still be able to click through the snow even though its an interface…

Read full topic

item.title: ::snowon and ::snowoff
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

There’s a packet that you can sent from the server -> client that lets you walk through interfaces. All you have to do is find the snow interface ID, then send the packet.

Read full topic

item.title: ::snowon and ::snowoff
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

[quote=“s1gma, post:3, topic:448567”][quote author=DannyIsSoPro link=topic=551467.msg4040927#msg4040927 date=1341624015]
I don’t think it’s an interface. Sorry but I can’t really help you but telling you that I doubt it’s an interface, and I wouldn’t make a command to turn the snow on… seems… hard-coded. Know what I mean?
[/quote]hard-coded was not the term you were looking for[/quote]

Yeah haha, I couldn’t really find a way I could express what I was trying to say. But I’m going to rephrase that and say, “I don’t think making a command for this is a very effective way of doing this”.

Read full topic

item.title: ::snowon and ::snowoff
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

I don’t think it’s an interface. Sorry but I can’t really help you but telling you that I doubt it’s an interface, and I wouldn’t make a command to turn the snow on… seems… hard-coded. Know what I mean? But anyway, just set the graphical snow to appear on login; now I don’t know how the snow works because I never really messed with it.
Although, I remember seeing in 562 admin consoles there was snowfall that went down the panel. So maybe check out where that’s managed. Maybe it’s client sided? o.O

Read full topic

item.title: ::snowon and ::snowoff
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

I know how to create a command…
But id like snow to be falling from the sky…
It an interface I know…
But id like to be able to click through it… and for it to stay on even if another interface comes up…
This is a PI 317…
Ill get the command started

if playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("snowon")) { p.sendMessage("<img=2><col=255>Merry Christmas!!!</col>"); }

Read full topic
